title: Patch 6.2 is live!
body:
Hi Everyone,

6.2 is live on Oceania and we are here and waiting to respond to any first day patch issues you may encounter. If you do encounter any bugs after patching, please post them here for our team to investigate.

Cheers!
-Mindstar

replies.body:
Hi 

Just patched.  Was in ranked Q but the game seemed to stall just as it should have started to load post-Q and it refuses to reconnect after quitting.  Just has 'reconnect' button that does nothing when clicked.

Thanks
same issue here
same and when i left the game told me to reconect but it doesnt let me
A lot o this
Exact same issue
same
Can't reconnect to game. Get stuck at champ select then if you restart client, it wont reconnect.
Same thing happend R.I.P

Yes same thing Champion select didnt go into game loading progression after 0 seconds nothing happened and we could all talk in champ select chat restarted my client and im stuck on reconnect screen which dosent reconnect you

Yeah! The same thing happened to me. we were in the "preparing for battle" part for champion select and it just wouldn't start. so i restarted league and when i hit the reconnect button it would make th sound but wouldn't do anything. it is still like this right now.
this is so bad all i want to do is play and same thing has happened to me just looking a reconnect screen
also now when i close my league. league is telling me i will get a time penalty which i think is unfair because i can't even reconnect to a game i couldn't even play.
they will short that out and if they don't then there is something wrong with roit

When it says "Prepare yourselves. The battle is about to begin!" it just sits there, chats open for anyone to type in so its not just for me, its for everyone in the queue, and me and my duo tried to re-log but now it wont connect, so we cant even play.{{item:3070}}
Yup Patch 6.2 is BROKEN!
Rip Servers Arent Working
where is the lunar shop?

I second this question! I was SO looking forward to the Lunar Shop and then a great big.... NOTHING. Disappointing. Just double checked the patch notes and it does say it should be available from 28 Jan (today) until 8 Feb. Maybe I just need to be more patient. Can someone confirm that it is on its way?

as of 7:16pm eastern time 1/28/2016, the reconnect button seems to not work.  I can restart my computer, log in and chat with people but in terms of recnonecting to the game, it does not work, please fix.

> [{quoted}](name=HmoobQuincy,realm=NA,application-id=3fteLeTW,discussion-id=EO8yML3j,comment-id=001a,timestamp=2016-01-29T00:16:58.274+0000)
>
> as of 7:16pm eastern time 1/28/2016, the reconnect button seems to not work.  I can restart my computer, log in and chat with people but in terms of recnonecting to the game, it does not work, please fix.

P.S ( THIS HAPPEN THE FIRST TIME I UPDATE TO THE NEW PATCH)

I found the Bug on Rework Shen which when you play him in lane he get Dumped on every Match up anyway to bring the Old Shen back which got no bugs?{{champion:98}} {{champion:98}} {{champion:98}} {{champion:98}}

Patched the game this morning and when I finished a game and wanted to duo with a mate it said it was in a game.
Re-Logged and said to reconnect (Done this a few times).
Now re-installing seeing if anything changes.
u find the problem?
I've still got the cant connect to game bug on mine, i started a thread for it talking about the details but i can't play league and ive reinstalled and everything
It wont even let me download the patch, "unspecified error"
It is noce to see Riot being transparent with patch releases but it makes me wonder if some shit is supposed to hit the fan?
Umm, the patch notes weren't on the OCE homepage. Had to go to NA homepage to check it out.

Hi,

Thanks for letting me know.  I checked the OCE homepage just now and it seems they are there.

If you can't see them, can you attach a screenshot to this so we can check into it?


Thanks 
Mindstar
wheres jhin?!?
Read the patch notes... releases in 1 week.

> [{quoted}](name=xXgilbertXx,realm=OCE,application-id=3fteLeTW,discussion-id=EO8yML3j,comment-id=0013,timestamp=2016-01-27T23:32:40.788+0000)
>
> wheres jhin?!?

He's here, but he's not gonna be available for another week or so

Um guys I found a minor Shen bug, the taunt effect isn't instant and sometimes when I taunt people although they can't do anything, they don't walk towards me until a second later. The old taunt on Shen used to be instant and this one has a very small lag but still noticeable

{{champion:98}} {{champion:98}} {{champion:98}} {{champion:98}} {{champion:98}} {{champion:98}} {{champion:98}} {{champion:98}}

Most of the issues reported in the last 20 minutes or so are related[ to this issue](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/zcrEGeXl-server-issues-28th-jan-2015) - rather than the 6.2 Patch. Please keep an eye on that thread for updates.
wtf help
http://matchhistory.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/OC1/120340021/207944705 It says I have loss prevented but I have 4 ranked losses Wtf Rito plz
fixed ty rito
we cant reconnect

Hi, went into a ranked game just after the patch had finished. It was a completely normal game. When it finished the stats weren't loading so i skipped them, then tried to join a game. It told me I was already in a game please reconnect etc. I tried to reconnect and it came up with error messages. I've restarted the client a few times and it is still broken, saying reconnect. I'm repairing the client now in hopes it will do something. Also my LP hasn't changed since the ranked game.

Thanks.

Yo 
Just won a ranked game and then wasnt able to see post match and so i clicked on skip

Now im stuck on the 'reconnect' button that does nothing when clicked.

thx
Stuck in champ select (Ranked games) ! Please fix asap {{champion:32}}
Cant recconect, after i did champ select my lol froze i closed it and it said game abandoned i pressed reconnect and it doesnt let me im stuck :(
i can't seem to join the game after we have waited for the countdown it just stays there???
having the same issue here as well going to use the repair option on the client see if that works {{item:3070}}
Can't reconnect :/
